name: Red Bell Pepper Almond Pesto with Spaghetti
description: This red bell pepper almond pesto with spaghetti makes such an easy and healthy weeknight dinner! It's not only insanely delicious but also packed with nutrients!
recipeIngredient: fresh parsley and green onions to sprinkle

recipeInstructions.text: Prepare the spaghetti according to the instructions on the package.
recipeInstructions.name: Prepare the spaghetti according to the instructions on the package.

recipeInstructions.text: In a medium skillet, heat one tablespoon olive oil over medium heat. Sauté the red bell pepper for about 5 minutes until it is slightly brown.
recipeInstructions.name: In a medium skillet, heat one tablespoon olive oil over medium heat. Sauté the red bell pepper for about 5 minutes until it is slightly brown.

recipeInstructions.text: Put it into a food processor with the chopped parsley, the remaining olive oil, the almonds, the nutritional yeast, the tomato paste, the lemon juice, and the garlic clove. Blend until smooth.
recipeInstructions.name: Put it into a food processor with the chopped parsley, the remaining olive oil, the almonds, the nutritional yeast, the tomato paste, the lemon juice, and the garlic clove. Blend until smooth.

recipeInstructions.text: Heat another tablespoon of olive oil in a medium pan and sauté the zucchini, green onions, and the mushrooms for about 4 minutes. Season with salt and pepper.
recipeInstructions.name: Heat another tablespoon of olive oil in a medium pan and sauté the zucchini, green onions, and the mushrooms for about 4 minutes. Season with salt and pepper.

recipeInstructions.text: Stir in the red bell pepper almond pesto and the spelt spaghetti. Sprinkle with fresh parsley and green onions.
